questions.a: This app demonstrates scorekeeping for a Penalty Shoot-out and shows how to apply the Rule-of-6.
Tap 'Goal' or 'Miss' to record each kick. The app tracks scores and applies the Rule-of-6 until a winner is determined.
After five rounds, the team with more goals wins. If tied, sudden death continues until one team leads at the end of a round.
